## Installation

You can install the released version of firstContributionsInR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("firstContributionsInR")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jcrodriguez1989/firstContributionsInR")
```
